## Read in xlsx

```{r, message=FALSE}
happiness_df <- read_xls("./happiness/whr-happiness.xls", sheet=2,
                          range='A1:K157', col_names=TRUE) %>% 
   select(Country, `Happiness score`)

head(happiness_df)
```
